ValidationRule.description: Want opportunity to be created in stage 4 to make sure that Contract category is in place before moving to stage 5
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW() , OR(IsClosed = true, ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'5 - Awarded')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't create an opportunity directly into Stage = 5 - Awarded or higher, Please set to Stage 4 - Offer or lower.
